S04bsu026_u:1_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ madhye viharati
S04bsu026_u:1_1_0: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ utthāyāsanāt ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu026_u:1_1_1: dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ merupṛṣṭhe 'vaṣṭabhya yena bhaganān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu026_u:1_1_2: - ete hi bhagavan devāḥ caityanamaskriyāmaṇḍanāḥ etatpariṣanmaṇḍalapatitāḥ kathamapi
S04bsu026_u:1_1_3: brahmacaryapuṇyaprasavāḥ sadevake samārake sabrahmake loke saśramaṇabrāhmaṇaprajāsu
S04bsu026_u:1_1_4: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakopāsikāḥ subahulapuṇyaprasavāḥ bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ
S04bsu026_u:2_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu026_u:2_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
S04bsu026_u:3_2_0: sa tathāgataṃ paśyati / yaśca avalokiteśvara kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ
S04bsu026_u:3_2_1: apratiṣṭhite pṛthivīpradeśe āmalakamātraṃ caityaṃ sūcīmātraṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ bakulapuṣpamātraṃ
S04bsu026_u:3_4: itaḥ pracyāvya maraṇakālaṃ kṛtvā brahmaloke utpadyate /
S04bsu026_u:3_5: tataḥ pracyāvya kālaṃ kṛtvā śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmutpadyate /
S04bsu026_u:4_0: evamavocadbhagavān / sa rve ca te śrāvakāḥ, te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S04bsu026_u:4_1: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣat, sadevamanuṣyāsuragandharvalokaśca bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
